mapper.select: SELECT P.*, A.ACTIVITY_NAME, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM BASE_PRIZE_WIN PW WHERE PW.PRIZE_ID = P.PRIZE_ID AND PW.STATUS != 'DISABLE' ) WIN_NUMBER FROM BASE_PRIZE P LEFT JOIN BASE_ACTIVITY A ON A.ACTIVITY_ID = P.ACTIVITY_ID WHERE P.PRIZE_ID = #{prizeId, jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT LU.MOBILE, LU.CUST_ID FROM TD_LOGIN_USER_INFO LU WHERE LU.CUST_ID = #{custId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT T.CUST_ID WIN_CUST_ID, CONCAT(LEFT(T.MOBILE, 3), '****', RIGHT(T.MOBILE, 4)) WIN_CUST_PHONE, CAST(( SELECT IF ( P.AMOUNT_TYPE = 'FIXED', P.FIXED_AMOUNT, P.RANDOM_AMOUNT_MIN + FLOOR((RAND() * (P.RANDOM_AMOUNT_MAX - P.RANDOM_AMOUNT_MIN) * 100)) / 100 ) FROM BASE_PRIZE P WHERE P.PRIZE_ID = #{prizeId, jdbcType=INTEGER} ) AS DECIMAL(18,2)) WIN_AMOUNT FROM TD_LOGIN_USER_INFO T
T.MOBILE IS NOT NULL AND T.MOBILE != '' AND T.STATE = '00' AND T.ROLE_ID = 'per' AND LENGTH(T.MOBILE) = 11
AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM BASE_PRIZE_WIN PW WHERE PW.WIN_CUST_ID = T.CUST_ID AND PW.STATUS != 'DISABLE' AND PW.PRIZE_ID = #{prizeId, jdbcType=INTEGER} )
AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM BASE_PRIZE_WIN PW WHERE PW.WIN_CUST_ID = T.CUST_ID AND PW.STATUS != 'DISABLE' AND PW.PRIZE_ID IN (SELECT PRIZE_ID FROM BASE_PRIZE WHERE ACTIVITY_ID = #{activityId, jdbcType=INTEGER}) )
AND DATE_FORMAT(T.CREATE_TIME ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') >= #{limitRegisterDateStart}
AND DATE_FORMAT(T.CREATE_TIME ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') <= #{limitRegisterDateEnd}
ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BASE_PRIZE_WIN ( PRIZE_ID, WIN_CUST_ID, WIN_CUST_NAME, WIN_CUST_PHONE, WIN_AMOUNT, EFFECTIVE_DEADLINE, INST_USER, INST_DATE ) VALUES ( #{prizeId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{winCustId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{winCustName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{winCustPhone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{winAmount, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{effectiveDeadline, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{instUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{instDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
